caption.p: Cytokine levels in control population that received tacrolimus and methotrexate for GvHD prophylaxis. Concentration of IL-6, sIL-6R, IL-2, IL-4, IL-10, IL-17, TNF-α, and IFN-g in the serum of patients (n=11) who received Tac/MTX for the prevention of aGvHD prior to the start of conditioning, and at days 7, 14 and 28. * P<0.05, *** P<0.001. IL: interleukin; sIL: soluble interleukin; TNF-α: tumor necrosis factor α; IFN-γ: interferon γ.
